examples: Cibotium oregonense Barrington in Amer. J. Bot., 70: 1118 (1983).  Polystichum talamancanum Barrington in Ann. Missouri Bot. Gard., 76: 369 (1989); Ammophila breviligulata Fernald  subsp. champlainensis ( F.Seym.  ) P.J.Walker  , C.A.Paris  &  Barrington  ex Barkworth (2006).
